conversation.text: For an espionage movie recommendation, I would suggest 'Argo'. This film features a CIA agent using the cover of a Hollywood production to rescue hostages in Tehran during the Iran hostage crisis. Starring Tate Donovan as the protagonist, 'Argo' offers a thrilling and realistic espionage tale.
